thread.title: Dick Vitale rips Kansas fans for leaving early in comeback OT win vs. West Virginia
thread.title_full: Dick Vitale rips Kansas fans for leaving early in comeback OT win vs. West Virginia

author: Joe Rodgers (joseph.rodgers@peformgroup.com)
title: Dick Vitale rips Kansas fans for leaving early in comeback OT win vs. West Virginia
text:
46pm  46pm   Kansas Jayhawks, West Virginia Mountaineers The ESPN broadcaster laid into KU fans for leaving early against West Virginia, saying they "can't just be frontrunners." Dick Vitale  46  46 p.m. ET 
Kansas nearly lost two consecutive home games for the first time since the 1988-89 season, and some Jayhawks fans didn't want to see the ending of what seemed to be another loss to West Virginia this season 
Trailing the No. 9 Mountaineers by double digits late at Allen Fieldhouse on Monday, a considerable amount of fans left the arena, much to the chagrin of ESPN commentator Dick Vitale. 
Vitale then ripped the fair-weathered fans, saying they "can't just be frontrunners." rpmsports18: They're heading to the exits early at The Fog ESPN SportsCenter https://t.co/t9tYVEEqSg pic.twitter.com/G0Gs0B58dG 
No. 3 Kansas was down 14 when Vitale disparaged the fans, but the Jayhawks battled back to force overtime, igniting Vitale to call the fans who left "unloyal." mattclapp: Dickie V still at it about the KU fans leaving early lol ESPN SportsCenter https://t.co/njzViysUgI pic.twitter.com/MnZl6NqSH5 
The Jayhawks went on to win, 84-80. Watch This
